title: shasan
author: shasan
content: What happened:: Providing Fake google business Reviews which is illegal. They will provide bulk reviews to attract customers. As they will provide a single review and will not provide the base of the review on the service it may turn into a scam. Because The business they will promote might not be a good project but for their fake reviews customer may fall into their trap.Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=983073Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5447409Additional Notes: Quote from: dbs00 on April 03, 2023, 02:35:13 PM⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Google My Business Reviews. 5 Stars Sticky HQ SEO Optimized Content. Helps with Ranking & Sales ✅!​Simple Pricing:12$ - 1 Review Post in the thread with "Bitcointalk discount 17%" and I'll pm you the discount code10$ - 1 Review - for bitcoin talk usersSEO Optimized content according to your business. We'll use the keywords ( + variations of them ) that you'll provide. If you don't want to provide keywords, we'll do basic keyword research and use those. We'll use whatever else you'll provide: ex: the products that you want to raise your rank on. You're staff's name. We'll use LOCAL IPWe'll use Local Coordinates, set in the vicinity of your GMB.Drip-feed according to your specifications!Delivery time ~ 24hPayment methods:Crypto - automaticManual: Paypal, Perfect Money, Adv Cash & others can be arrangedIf needed, we can set them to go live only after you approve the review firsthand.30 days warranty! They Non-Drop for NOW but Google is Google so if they happen to drop, we'll replace the reviews done in the last 30 days.Do you have negative reviews? The best way to "remove them" is to bury them with 5 Star Reviews.A mix of: Long-form reviews, praising your services/products, emoticons, talking about local placesThey might look fake as a regular customer won't waste time in posting such long reviews butthese are the kind of reviews that you get when you're providing your customers with a worthy incentive.Ex if you're doing a 500$-1k $ sale and providing the customer with a 5-10% discount if they leave you a comprehensive review, this is the kind of review you will get.If you're doing a 50$ sale, and providing the customer with a 10% discount for a review, you'll probably get a 5 star without a comment, or a reply with "sure, I'll do it soon!"... but we all know that won't happen.Q: Why should you buy reviews?A: Because you need reviews in order to convince customers to choose your listing instead of your competitors.A: Because it helps with local ranking when done properly.A: Helps with sales, search for some stats and you'll be amazed. People consider reviews as the next best thing after a personal recommendation from their friends.Even if you're ranking First or Second, if the third listing has more reviews than you, they will probably get the clicks. Isn't that something that you're doing as well when choosing a service or product? usually going with the company that has the most reviews and a better average!Q: Bulk discount?A: Not at this moment, check the latest posts in this thread maybe things have changed since I created this thread.Q: Why should you choose me among the dozen review sellers around?A: Using my own team, not outsourcing. If you stop buying more reviews, we won't start blackmailing you with 1-star reviews until you start buying again. Yes, this crap is being done by plenty of sellers. I've been around since 2014 and I've got flawless REAL feedback here and on multiple freelancing sites. hehe, yes I know I'm selling reviews now, but I'm not boosting my own reviews. (this is a new service I'm providing, I've got feedback across multiple sites over the last 10 years)Q: Can you remove negative reviews?A: NO, but I can help you bury them with multiple new & great 5-star reviews. I've looked into it and If a seller tells you he can remove negative reviews, its a HUGE RED flag, play it safe (test first with a random GMB).Q: Delivery Time?A: Usually within 24h during working hours Monday - Friday.Q: In what countries can you do reviews?A: Any country! If the review isn't in English, we'll pass it along for approval before posting it (so you can correct it as we'll use AI translation)Q: Can you customize the accounts from which the reviews are being posted?A: Sure, tell me what you need!Q: Where can I order?A: If you want to pay via crypto you can order here ( clicking this ) and after you can contact me!A: If you want to pay via other method, contact me first (use the skype button below) so we can set it up!Or you can manually copy and paste this skype ID live:support_42971Be careful about scammers and impersonators.Use the skype button to prevent that.Flags: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3145

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: QuoteQ: Can you remove negative reviews?A: NO, but I can help you bury them with multiple new & great 5-star reviews. I've looked into it and If a seller tells you he can remove negative reviews, its a HUGE RED flag, play it safe (test first with a random GMB).I hate this, negative reviews probably came from real users and if they are going to bury those bad reviews the buyer cannot see the bad sides of the product or services, that is why when checking review sites I always check the bad feedback than the good ones even if it is buried 5 pages up, knowing that fake good reviews can be bought.Companies prefer to hire these people than improve their products and services so better do diligent research than check these reviews

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 03, 2023, 11:41:00 PMI hate this, negative reviews probably came from real users and if they are going to bury those bad reviews the buyer cannot see the bad sides of the product or services, that is why when checking review sites I always check the bad feedback than the good ones even if it is buried 5 pages upI do not rely on positive/negative feedback though. I read the comments of the feedback and from there we can identify which is real or not if the accused person provide positive feedback with related SEO keyword then the site will be promoted based on the fake reviews and for that, the users of the site might not get a perfect service.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Due to such service providers, it has become difficult for customers to believe the positive rating of any service. Since fake positive feedback, ratings can be purchased, any business owner will want to purchase those services to increase their sales. And because of that service, ordinary buyers will be directly cheated who buy something after seeing that positive feedback, rating. Those who provide these fake services are making it easy for scammers to scam users.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It baffles me alot how people wake up one morning and start thinking of abnormal things to do in this space. I wonder what they benefit from all these misleading, fake and mischievous review and ratings they do. They do all these just to project their products without any strong base to stand upon thereby misleading the masses into investing and keying into their fake products and after a while they start having issues as a result of the foundation on which they started. They forget an honest review and ratings makes a product better and stronger for Service delivery irrespective of the time spent  working and fixing it up.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on April 04, 2023, 05:57:59 PMDue to such service providers, it has become difficult for customers to believe the positive rating of any service. Since fake positive feedback, ratings can be purchased, any business owner will want to purchase those services to increase their sales. And because of that service, ordinary buyers will be directly cheated who buy something after seeing that positive feedback, rating. Those who provide these fake services are making it easy for scammers to scam users.It has become a scammers' tool because it's fake they can make the potential buyers desire to try the product and the service, unfortunately, it become a common practice both for big and small companies, they need to boost their online presence and they can only do that by buying fake reviews, so if you're a potential buyer always check the bad feedbacks too not only those good feedbacks that almost look like a shill.It's easy to tell, reviews that praise the product or services in high heavens can be considered paid reviews, a good review coming from even a satisfied buyer will still post the bad side of the product.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on April 04, 2023, 09:36:35 PMQuote from: ScamViruS on April 04, 2023, 05:57:59 PMDue to such service providers, it has become difficult for customers to believe the positive rating of any service. Since fake positive feedback, ratings can be purchased, any business owner will want to purchase those services to increase their sales. And because of that service, ordinary buyers will be directly cheated who buy something after seeing that positive feedback, rating. Those who provide these fake services are making it easy for scammers to scam users.It has become a scammers' tool because it's fake they can make the potential buyers desire to try the product and the service, unfortunately, it become a common practice both for big and small companies, they need to boost their online presence and they can only do that by buying fake reviews, so if you're a potential buyer always check the bad feedbacks too not only those good feedbacks that almost look like a shill.It's easy to tell, reviews that praise the product or services in high heavens can be considered paid reviews, a good review coming from even a satisfied buyer will still post the bad side of the product.Those who know about this kind of service, before buying any service, they see the positive and negative feedbacks and then buy it. But those who buy such fake rating services actually target customers with relatively less experience, so they use such fake rating and feedback services to continue their business. So we who know that fake rating, how feedback works, actually they are not easily fooled by these website owners

comments.author: CarnagexD
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 03, 2023, 11:41:00 PMQuoteQ: Can you remove negative reviews?A: NO, but I can help you bury them with multiple new & great 5-star reviews. I've looked into it and If a seller tells you he can remove negative reviews, its a HUGE RED flag, play it safe (test first with a random GMB).I hate this, negative reviews probably came from real users and if they are going to bury those bad reviews the buyer cannot see the bad sides of the product or services, that is why when checking review sites I always check the bad feedback than the good ones even if it is buried 5 pages up, knowing that fake good reviews can be bought.Companies prefer to hire these people than improve their products and services so better do diligent research than check these reviews Definitely, negative reviews should be taken seriously. Receiving negative reviews of your product can be disheartening, but it's important to keep a positive attitude and use the feedback constructively to improve your product and customer satisfaction. If they solve those negative reviews and work it out, they wouldn't have to fake positive reviews and fool their customers. In the end, it will be their business who'll benefit. Quote from: ScamViruS on April 04, 2023, 09:50:26 PMThose who know about this kind of service, before buying any service, they see the positive and negative feedbacks and then buy it. But those who buy such fake rating services actually target customers with relatively less experience, so they use such fake rating and feedback services to continue their business. So we who know that fake rating, how feedback works, actually they are not easily fooled by these website ownersRight. It is still the customer's responsibility to verify those reviews before making a purchase. Customers can verify reviews by looking at multiple sources of feedback like review sites, social media and even asking for referrals from friends or family. They can also look for patterns in the reviews and consider the credibility of the reviewer. But I'm thorn  because while customers do have a responsibility to be informed and make informed decisions, it is ultimately the responsibility of the business to provide accurate and truthful information about their products and services. Don't keep on scamming people.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: CarnagexD on April 08, 2023, 12:27:35 PM..It is still the customer's responsibility to verify those reviews before making a purchase. Customers can verify reviews by looking at multiple sources of feedback like review sites, social media and even asking for referrals from friends or family. They can also look for patterns in the reviews and consider the credibility of the reviewer. But I'm thorn  because while customers do have a responsibility to be informed and make informed decisions, it is ultimately the responsibility of the business to provide accurate and truthful information about their products and services. Don't keep on scamming people. Buyers should do that, especially if the review sites are showing too good to be true reviews, almost to the point of shilling the product or services, good reviews need not be in a shilling form, good buyers should be aware that there is such a thing as fake reviews and should look for negative feedback as well, there is no such thing as perfect product or services there will be reviews that will detail the pros and cons, advantages and disadvantages of a product and services, so buyers or clients should have a keen eye and a good observation to see what falls to fake and paid reviews.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on April 08, 2023, 01:04:54 PMBuyers should do that, especially if the review sites are showing too good to be true reviews, almost to the point of shilling the product or services, good reviews need not be in a shilling form, good buyers should be aware that there is such a thing as fake reviews and should look for negative feedback as well, there is no such thing as perfect product or services there will be reviews that will detail the pros and cons, advantages and disadvantages of a product and services, so buyers or clients should have a keen eye and a good observation to see what falls to fake and paid reviews.Those who are aware about the paid reviews can identity which can be paid reviews and which not. As you have said I am agree with you that there is no service which might have everything positive so when any sites have all positive reviews it can be said that those are paid. And the style of paid reviews and real reviews can not be the same style.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: CarnagexD on April 08, 2023, 12:27:35 PMQuote from: ScamViruS on April 04, 2023, 09:50:26 PMThose who know about this kind of service, before buying any service, they see the positive and negative feedbacks and then buy it. But those who buy such fake rating services actually target customers with relatively less experience, so they use such fake rating and feedback services to continue their business. So we who know that fake rating, how feedback works, actually they are not easily fooled by these website ownersRight. It is still the customer's responsibility to verify those reviews before making a purchase. Customers can verify reviews by looking at multiple sources of feedback like review sites, social media and even asking for referrals from friends or family. They can also look for patterns in the reviews and consider the credibility of the reviewer. But I'm thorn  because while customers do have a responsibility to be informed and make informed decisions, it is ultimately the responsibility of the business to provide accurate and truthful information about their products and services. Don't keep on scamming people. Basically those who come up with the idea of ​​doing business for a long time will not want to cheat their customers by buying such fake reviews. And those who buy fake reviews to attract customers to make a quick buck, so not much information about their product exists online. So whether their product is genuine or fake cannot be verified. So it is important to check whether the product is genuine or fake but also to see how serious the company is in business. Because real companies will never cheat their customers by buying such fake reviews.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on April 10, 2023, 03:24:54 PMSo it is important to check whether the product is genuine or fake but also to see how serious the company is in business. Because real companies will never cheat their customers by buying such fake reviews.But all those products/services might have the same type of information which has on the reputed site. By checking the product description or the service it is very hard to understand which are trying to scam and which aren't.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 03, 2023, 09:39:36 PMWhat happened:: Providing Fake google business Reviews which is illegal. They will provide bulk reviews to attract customers. As they will provide a single review and will not provide the base of the review on the service it may turn into a scam. Because The business they will promote might not be a good project but for their fake reviews customer may fall into their trap.The service provided by this person is really illegitimate and enables scammers to promote their services and scam projects in order to appear to potential customers as legitimate because these false 5-star reviews contribute to misleading people and keeping them away from the truth, and it will be easy for newbie customers to believe these reviews/ratings and they are pulled into the plot and lose their capitals.It's good, my friend @shasan, that you posted this thread to make the community vigilant so that they don't trust the reviews of people blindly about a site, project, or service before doing their personal research.I have already supported the flag

comments.author: Tim1996
comments.body: Fake review hurts the real customers who rely on internet.Once I went booked a hotel room seeing the rooms on internet and found that they in real the hotel was pathetic.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: albon on April 10, 2023, 10:49:35 PM these false 5-star reviews contribute to misleading people and keeping them away from the truth, and it will be easy for newbie customers to believe these reviews/ratings and they are pulled into the plot and lose their capitals.I agree with your opinion actually you have said the thing which is in my heart. There are a lot of users on the internet who has not enough knowledge about fake reviews and they will think of these types of reviews as real and they will fall into the trap.

comments.author: smyslov
comments.body: Quote from: Tim1996 on April 11, 2023, 02:13:33 AMFake review hurts the real customers who rely on internet.Once I went booked a hotel room seeing the rooms on internet and found that they in real the hotel was pathetic.It really is and the only way to get back to them is to expose them by giving lengthy reviews on your actual experience in that hotel you can go as far as telling in the reviews that there's a possibility of them paying people to give good reviews, people love to read storytelling experiences on their reviews because paid reviews are shill type while telling your whole experience through telling will make your review a true one.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 10, 2023, 09:53:22 PMQuote from: ScamViruS on April 10, 2023, 03:24:54 PMSo it is important to check whether the product is genuine or fake but also to see how serious the company is in business. Because real companies will never cheat their customers by buying such fake reviews.But all those products/services might have the same type of information which has on the reputed site. By checking the product description or the service it is very hard to understand which are trying to scam and which aren't.That's right too. They arrange everything in such a way that there is no way to tell if it is a fake product or not. Now the situation is created that customers hesitate to trust even the real product. Such fake review service providers have made business easy for scammers and created a challenging environment for genuine entrepreneurs.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: smyslov on April 11, 2023, 12:45:22 PMIt really is and the only way to get back to them is to expose them by giving lengthy reviews on your actual experience in that hotel you can go as far as telling in the reviews that there's a possibility of them paying people to give good reviews, people love to read storytelling experiences on their reviews because paid reviews are shill type while telling your whole experience through telling will make your review a true one.It will not help us anything as they will buy positive feedback from shill sellers regularly which will increase a lot their reputation on the internet the real reviews will have no value among the paid shill reviews.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 11, 2023, 09:21:15 PMQuote from: smyslov on April 11, 2023, 12:45:22 PMIt really is and the only way to get back to them is to expose them by giving lengthy reviews on your actual experience in that hotel you can go as far as telling in the reviews that there's a possibility of them paying people to give good reviews, people love to read storytelling experiences on their reviews because paid reviews are shill type while telling your whole experience through telling will make your review a true one.It will not help us anything as they will buy positive feedback from shill sellers regularly which will increase a lot their reputation on the internet the real reviews will have no value among the paid shill reviews.They can pay for good reviews but once a vlogger and influencer become the victim of their false products or service they will be exposed, a vlogger or an influencer's review is worth a thousand paid reviews, although they also engage in paid reviews they made sure that before they promote products and services they have tried the product and it is really good because their reputation is at stake on those reviews.
